title: Ticket #2469: Plan integration between UCS and Condor
description:
We want to allow Condor to interact with Cisco's UCS (Unified Computing System). The exact form of that interaction is yet to be decided. It may include additions to Condor to talk with UCS and tools that sit on top of Condor that interact with UCS.

Progress

Jaime has done some initial experiments writing code that talks to UCS via its http/xml interface using Cisco's simulator VM. He instructed UCS to disassociate a profile. He started on code to tell UCS to associate a profile.

TODO

  • Finish test code to associate a profile (2 days)
  • Write test code to monitor status of blades and active profiles (2 days)
  • Determine useful stats that can be gathered (2 days)
  • Plan how to integrate with Condor (GAHP, grid universe type, etc)
